original_title: Une Femme Taxi à Sidi Bel Abbès
overview: When her husband died Soumicha, mother of three, had to earn a living. She became the only woman taxi driver in Sidi Bel-Abbès, Algeria. This film accompanies Soumicha around a city where religious and political violence rages, and records her experiences in a job normally reserved for men.
title: Une Femme Taxi à Sidi Bel Abbès
